type: Legendary Creature – Human Berserker Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Imperial Lineage[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library, you may play that card this turn.
[i]Garreg Mach House Leader[/i] – Other creatures you control have trample. If you control another Garreg Mach House Leader, creatures you control have trample and haste.
